mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.release_date AS "releaseDate", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "jgxySysMenu.id", t.name AS "jgxySysMenu.name", t.parent_id AS "jgxySysMenu.parentId", t.parent_ids AS "jgxySysMenu.parent_ids", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.title AS "title", a.contents AS "contents", a.click_throughput AS "clickThroughput"
LEFT JOIN jgxy_sys_menu t ON t.id = a.remarks LEFT JOIN sys_user u13 ON u13.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM jgxy_note a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND (a.remarks = #{jgxySysMenu.id} or t.parent_ids like concat('%',#{jgxySysMenu.id},'%'))
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.release_Date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jgxy_note( id, create_by, release_date, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, title, contents, click_throughput ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{releaseDate}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{jgxySysMenu.id}, #{delFlag}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{clickThroughput} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jgxy_note SET release_Date = #{releaseDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{jgxySysMenu.id}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, click_throughput = #{clickThroughput} WHERE id = #{id}
